title: Data Science Intern
description: Join our team as a Data Science Intern to work on real-world datasets, build predictive models, and uncover actionable insights. Ideal for individuals passionate about data analysis, machine learning, and solving complex problems

title: AI Intern
description: We are seeking an enthusiastic AI Intern to assist in developing and testing machine learning models, data preprocessing pipelines, and AI-driven solutions. The intern will collaborate with our data science team on real-world projects, gaining hands-on experience with tools such as Python, TensorFlow, and NLP frameworks. This role is ideal for candidates eager to learn, experiment, and contribute to innovative AI applications.
